list.text: Who says food can't double as decor? To add warmth to your home, create a cocoa brewing station, made complete with mugs, stirrers and a dispenser.
A miniature display of Santa Claus and his reindeer looks especially fun on some fake snow.
This blogger got into the spirit by drawing up a beautiful Christmas tree on her chalkboard wall (and we love her door-frame garland, too!).
Instead of a traditional sign that reads "Joy", replace the 'O' with a wreath that incorporates all colors of the holiday.
This blogger devoted the space in front of her decked-out mirror to her beautiful collection of angel statues.
Who needs a real tree (or even a fake one)? Pull of a dazzling display with just a few pretty ornaments.
